Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

Controller in a MVC gui. Both Model and View expose objects that must be connected. The constructor makes the connection using inner anonymous classes.

Controller

public Controller(View v,

Construct this controller. Define a suitable listener for the widgets of the View, and call appropriate methods of the Model.
Parameters:
v - The view.
m - The model.
